name: Dark Tints
description: Dark tints block 75% of sunlight and offer 100% UVA/B protection.

name: Gradient tints
description: Dark at the top and fading to clear at the bottom of the lens, gradient tints are both fashionable and great for driving. Complete with UVA/B blocking filter.

name: Polarised
description: Polarised lenses block 99.7% of reflected glare, enhance contrast and improve visual performance. They are 85% light absorbing and come complete with a UVA/B blocking filter.
